title: I Cant play LOL
body: Every time I open LOL a black screen appears and say's out of range;(  I saw one of your older post regarding this issue i tried changing the one you said but when i save it its says access denied     hope you could help me thanks.

replies.body:
When you say open LOL do you mean the client or in-game?  Your resolution settings for the game could be causing issues.  See if resetting your config might help here by restoring them to default.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
